value:
People say the eggs I painted for the
spring festival turn out...strange.
But Sharena said they look fine.

I've celebrated a spring festival only
once. Colorful outfits, communal
feasts—all of it, very nice!

You work so tirelessly. If you're
hungry, I might have a spring-festival
egg around here somewhere.

I've heard of a most curious tradition
that's done during spring festivals.
Egg rolling—heard of it?$k$pIt sounds like a carefree way to spend
the day. We should find a field nearby
and try it out sometime.

Zzz...zzz... Oh! Sorry. Thinking of
spring is so pleasant that I nod
off. Sorry again.

I've come with spring greetings
for you, $Nu.$k$pMay your days be forever warm
and lovely.

I feel as if a flower has just burst
into full bloom within me!

The strength of spring serves
more than me alone.

How dismal. Has winter laid claim
to my heart?

Thank you. Each new ray of sunlight
brings more hope to my heart.

I am Lucina, future Exalt of Ylisse.
The spring festival is such a breath
of fresh air, don't you think?

I imagine that you could only be
curious about spring-festival
outfits, $Nu.$k$pWe have many kinds of these
festival costumes in Ylisse.$k$pOne was an egg—cracked on one
side. Another was a shirt that
showed my father...in bunny ears!$k$pPeople even go around swinging
carrot weapons!$k$pI'm sure that our bond would
strengthen if we both dressed up
to enjoy such festivities!$k$pOh...not interested? I see. I was
only thinking that if our bond
was as strong as possible...$k$pWell, then that would be enough
for me if I go back home.
I'd like to remember you forever.$k$pSorry to get melancholy. Anyway,
even if we don't go hopping down
the trail together in costumes...$k$pI know our bond is strong as it is,
and I hope you'll have me stay
here and help you as long as I can.
えいっ
Here I go!
ええっ！？
What are you-?!
You will not stop my festivity!
Spring gives me strength!
I say when winter's over!
Bunny blast!
A petal falls.
Heehee
Happy spring festival!
Spring is my favorite time of year. It's when I was born.
This headpiece is the height of fashion, don't you think?
Where I come from, there are shape-shifters called Taguel that can turn into rabbits.
In my world, I returned from a future where...we didn't celebrate the coming of spring like this.
I should hide eggs around this world while I have the chance. Who knows when I'll have to return home?
If ever this war ends, I'd love to show you Ylisse's spring festival. I'd get you a stylish headpiece like this!
OK.
Ah, spring.
How pleasant.
Let's go hop into a garden and see what's blooming!
